attr.pathogenesis: abnormal twisting of the stomach on its mesenteric axis, with subsequent gastric gas accumulation and distention

reference: Shaver SL, et al. Gastric dilation-volvulus in dogs attending UK emergency-care veterinary practices: prevalence, risk factors and survival. J Small Anim Pract. 2017;58(11):629-638.

attr.breed: German shepherd, Great Dane, standard poodle, Saint Bernard, Doberman pinscher, Irish setter, and Weimaraner

attr.principle: visualization of gastric dilation and displacement

reference: Gastric Dilatation and Volvulus: Stabilization and Surgery. Desiree Rosselli, DVM, DACVS (Small Animal). Today's Veterinary Practice, July/August 2017.

attr.principle: radiographic finding indicating craniodorsal displacement of the pylorus

reference: Gastric Dilatation and Volvulus: Stabilization and Surgery. Desiree Rosselli, DVM, DACVS (Small Animal). Today's Veterinary Practice, July/August 2017.

attr.principle: assessment of systemic effects and prognosis

reference: Gastric Dilatation and Volvulus: Stabilization and Surgery. Desiree Rosselli, DVM, DACVS (Small Animal). Today's Veterinary Practice, July/August 2017.

attr.principle: indicator of gastric necrosis and prognosis

reference: Plasma Lactate Concentration as a Predictor of the Outcome of an Acute Gastrointestinal Crisis in Small Animals. Zacher LA, et al. J Vet Intern Med. 2010 Jul-Aug;24(4):882-7.
Gastric Dilatation and Volvulus: Stabilization and Surgery. Desiree Rosselli, DVM, DACVS (Small Animal). Today's Veterinary Practice, July/August 2017.

attr.method: intravenous fluid therapy with crystalloids, colloids, and/or hypertonic saline

reference: https://www.merckvetmanual.com/digestive-system/diseases-of-the-stomach-and-intestines-in-small-animals/gastric-dilation-and-volvulus-in-small-animals

attr.method: passage of an orogastric tube or percutaneous gastrocentesis
attr.indication: relief of gastric distension and gas/fluid release

reference: https://www.merckvetmanual.com/digestive-system/diseases-of-the-stomach-and-intestines-in-small-animals/gastric-dilation-and-volvulus-in-small-animals

attr.method: emergency surgery to reposition stomach, evaluate for necrosis, and perform gastropexy
attr.indication: correction of volvulus and prevention of recurrence

reference: https://www.merckvetmanual.com/digestive-system/diseases-of-the-stomach-and-intestines-in-small-animals/gastric-dilation-and-volvulus-in-small-animals

attr.method: continued fluid therapy, pain control, anti-arrhythmic drugs
attr.indication: postoperative management and prevention of complications

reference: https://www.merckvetmanual.com/digestive-system/diseases-of-the-stomach-and-intestines-in-small-animals/gastric-dilation-and-volvulus-in-small-animals

attr.implementation: puzzle feeders or multiple shallow bowls

reference: Bloat: Gastric Dilatation and Volvulus in Dogs | VCA Animal Hospitals
Bloat: Gastric Dilatation and Volvulus in Dogs | VCA Animal Hospitals

attr.implementation: small, frequent sips using slow-feed water bowl

reference: A Guide To Understanding And Preventing Canine Bloat - Autumn Trails Veterinary Center

attr.implementation: surgical attachment of stomach to body wall

reference: GDV: Helping Your Dog Avoid a Deadly Disorder - Atlanta Humane Society

attr.pathogenesis: presence of gas within the gastric wall
